WorkItem.Description:
In the PHPExcel/Reader/Excel2007.php file canRead function there is a bug:
If the simplexml_load_string returns false then the foreach will fail.
It happening when it's not a zip file (e.g.: a csv file with unix or mac ending)
or not a Excel2007 zip file (so there are no .rels file in it).
Â 
The solution is very simple:
if ($rels) // this is the new line
  foreach ($rels-> ...)
WorkItem.Summary: Excel2007 Reader canRead function bug (with solution)
